title: Workshop on the Mathematical Foundations of Data Science
preview: This Thursday, together with my colleagues Arlind Kacirani and Uljad Berdica, we collaborated with Data and AI Tirana Meetup for a webinar on data science.
fullText:
This Thursday, together with my colleagues Arlind Kacirani and Uljad Berdica, we collaborated with Data and AI Tirana Meetup for a webinar on data science.

As guest lecturers, we covered key mathematical concepts essential for data science, including linear algebra, vector calculus, and probability theory.
